> <OLD>
>
> Hydras Hissed and said "You three go to trainning room... No maximals for
> now"then he opened his comlink to every Predacon and said "Give me regular
> reports of your duties"and he send a secret message to Cyclonus"Keep an eye
> in that spider, if you smell something fishy kill him in the spot"

The Predacons grumble at Hydras for telling them they wouldn't be in
battle any time soon, but the grumbling was muted with that hint of
fear and respect for thier leader, none of them seemed inclined to say
anything against Hydras in the open - in other words they were being
typical Predacons. Each of them began wondering off to get back to
whatever duties they had before the meeting was called.



Soon enough Hydras stood alone in the throne room. There was only him
and the hum of machinery and monitors in the room around him. Even
Inferno, his most loyal troop had left the room, although he was
standing just outside of the door should Hydras have need of him.

Cyclonus sent back to Hydras, "I will have Taratulus watch at all times."

(TAG)

Preston
